titles.title: Hazel M. Johnson Memorial Stamp Act
To provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Hazel M. Johnson, and for other purposes.
Hazel M. Johnson Memorial Stamp Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Hazel M. Johnson Memorial Stamp Act
This bill requires the U.S. Postal Service to issue a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Hazel M. Johnson, who was known as the mother of the environmental justice movement.
